name: Intelligent Mining
description:
Hi my name is Daniel Eli 
I am the CEO and founder of intelligent mining a 100% green mining infrastructure for the blockchain 
I created Intelligent mining in 2017 my goal is to move blockchain to a green Sustanible infrastructure I have over 2500 acres of land and 2 leading solar co as partnerships “REP energy” and “Recon solar” I believe that decentralized blockchains are the future of a real democracy I would like you to support my vision in protecting our planet our lovely animals and the future generations to come in every aspect from democracy of information to protecting the well being of wildlife that we are the only voice they can count on ! 
Please follow us at www.iM.farm we would love to welcome you to the family!
